# ssh key generated by 
```bash
    ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -m PEM ~/.ssh/inframe-design-institute-backend-github-action-deploy -C "inframe-design-institute-backend-github-action-deploy"

    cat ~/.ssh/inframe-design-institute-backend-github-action-deploy.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
    chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
    chmod 700 ~/.ssh
```

# for nginx 
```bash
    sudo cp deploy/nginx/inframe-design-institute-backend.conf /etc/nginx/sites-available/
    sudo ln -sf /etc/nginx/sites-available/inframe-design-institute-backend.conf /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/
    sudo nginx -t
    sudo systemctl reload nginx
```

# install SSL with Certbot
```bash
    sudo certbot --nginx -d api.inframedesigninstitute.com
```

# GitHub Actions Secrets Setup
## Before deployment, add the following secrets in your GitHub repository:
### PATH repo->settings->Secrets and variables->Actions
## Secret Name	Description
### VPS_HOST	Your VPS IP address or hostname
### VPS_USER	The Linux user on the VPS that will run the app
### VPS_SSH_KEY	Private SSH key corresponding to the public key added to the VPS user
